entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Blind River
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of snow. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h this afternoon. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 14 this morning and minus 8 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow. Temperature rising to minus 1 by morning.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 10 cm. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature rising to minus 1 by morning. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near zero. POP 30%
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending in the morning then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind south 20 km/h. Temperature steady near zero. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Tuesday 27 December 2022
